sentences.english: In addition, some laws to forbid any hunting of rare animals should be passed.
sentences.chinese: 此外，人们还应制定一些法律禁止捕杀珍稀动物。

sentences.english: Finally those who hunt them must be punished severely.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对涌锒猎珍稀野生动物的人必须严惩。

sentences.english: Gold wreaths are rare and were buried with ancient nobles or royalty.
sentences.chinese: 这些珍稀的金器是古代帝王或其皇族的随葬品。

sentences.english: Finally， those who hunter them must be punished severely.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对于捕猎珍稀野生动物的人必须严惩。

sentences.english: Typically, most blacksmiths buy or are given rare jewels from other players.
sentences.chinese: 通常多数铁匠会从其他玩家手中获得珍稀的宝石。

sentences.english: More and more people in China enter upon the campaign of saving rare animals out extinction.
sentences.chinese: 在中国越来越多的人投身于挽救珍稀动物的运动中。

sentences.english: In addition, the government should pass some laws to forbid any hunting of rare animals.
sentences.chinese: 此外，政府应通过一些法律禁止捕杀珍稀动物。

sentences.english: Finally , those who hunt them must be punished severely.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对于捕猎珍稀野生动物的人必须严惩。

sentences.english: Phellinus Igniarius is a rare natural medicine.
sentences.chinese: 桑黄是我国珍稀的一种天然药物。

sentences.english: The Wayfarer Rare Prints is a must have for any collector or enthusiast.
sentences.chinese: 该旅行者珍稀版画是一个必须有任何收藏家或爱好者。

sentences.english: And you can also find pavilions, rare flowers and ancient pines and cypresses.
sentences.chinese: 那里还有亭子，珍稀花草和古松可供观赏。

sentences.english: This paper mainly discusses the geographical distribution and protection of the rare and threatened plants.
sentences.chinese: 主要讨论了三清山珍稀濒危植物地理分布及保护。

sentences.english: The fisherman found a rare dugong in the water.
sentences.chinese: 这个渔夫打捞上来一条珍稀的人鱼。

sentences.english: Michelia skinneriana is a rare plant.
sentences.chinese: 野含笑为我国省级珍稀濒危植物。

sentences.english: And what about all those strange animals?
sentences.chinese: 你知道还有那些珍稀动物吗？

sentences.english: Andrias davidianus is a special product and one of the rare animals of China.
sentences.chinese: 中国大鲵是中国的一种特有珍稀动物。

definition: a rare treasure/sth priceless and unique
best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
